::Zardus::

"Excelent," Zardus says, walking into the room, "His head isn't really 
important."

Zardus takes a box, sliding it through the containment field and closing it 
around DeathStorm's spark. He turns around, heading for the next room.

The door opens as he aproaches, revealing a protoform laying on a table. The 
protoform was massive, looking like a living weapon, except for it wasn't 
living. Not yet, anyways. Zardus enters the room, carrying the box with the 
spark with him.

He aproaches the table, looking at a computer screen to make sure the 
protoform was ready. It was. All the fail-safe systems were in place. The bot 
would not revolt.

It had been a project from the early days of the Alliance, a project which 
has been delayed quite a long time. Zardus opens the box, taking the spark 
carefully into his hand, and lowering it toward the protoform. He releases 
the spark as it sinks into the protoform's chest, the chest plate closing 
over it. Zardus flips a switch on a comp panel, activating the new protoform.

He grins evilly and takes a step back as the protoform's optics light up.

"Arise .... Delta!"
